name: RedCap
description:
This is my last game in Pico for school. The goal was to make a Zelda like in one week.  
I passed a long time on the graphics so I was forced to limit the gameplay.  
If you have 5 to 10 minutes, you can play it .
I hope you enjoy.

PS : The game hasn't music, sorry .

Controls :

Press  Arrows to move.
Press C to move the cursor in the inventory.
Press X to continue.

Credit :
